@BebeHillz Clearly you haven't been around hentai for long. The fact that you even include "white" in that 95% statistic is just insane. Japanese hentai is made by Japanese people for Japanese people, so almost every light-skinned person in hentai is Japanese. In fact, there's so little hentai of ACTUAL white guys out there, and it's always some niche fetish like homestay/boarding house. In fact, I'd even go as far as to say that there's way more hentai with black males than white males. And the fact that someone "whitewashed" this one dude is just a response to the fetishization of black guys. It rarely happens, so you're blowing it out of proportion. Try to remember the last time you saw a hentai with a black dude that isn't racially charged. Similarly, try to remember the last time you saw a hentai with a non-black dude where the girl says that [race] cock is superior or some shit. Kinda tired of seeing people pretending like BBC porn is "just interracial porn."
